data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results
data.news_body: Unaudited Financial Results

data.caption: Audited Financial Results
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 33(3) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we attach herewith the statement containing the audited financial results for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2024 which was considered and approved at the Board Meeting held today.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended 31St December, 2023
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 33(3) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we enclose herewith the statement containing the unaudited financial results for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December, 2023 which was approved by the Board of Directors at their meeting held on 22nd January, 2024. Also enclosed is the Limited Review Report of the Statutory Auditors.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter And Half Year Ended 30Th September, 2023
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 33(3) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 we enclose herewith the statement containing the unaudited financial results for the quarter and half year ended 30th September, 2023 together with the statement of assets and liabilities and the cash flow which was considered and approved by the Board of Directors at their meeting held today. Also, enclosed is the Limited Review Report of the Statutory Auditors.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter Ended 30Th June, 2023
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 33(3) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we enclose herewith the statement containing the Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter ended 30th June, 2023 which was considered and approved by the Board of Directors at their meeting held today.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended 31St March, 2023
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 33(3) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 we enclose herewith the statement containing the audited financial results for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2023 which was considered and approved at the Board Meeting held today. Also, we enclose herewith the following :

1. Audit Report issued by Statutory Auditors
2. Declaration (Unmodified opinion)

data.caption: Disclosure On Related Party Transaction For Six Months Ended 30Th September, 2022
data.news_body: In compliance with Regulation 23(9) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2018 and SEBI circular No.SEBI/HO/CFD/CMD1/CIR/P/2021/662 dated November 22, 2021, we hereby submit the Related Party Transactions on a consolidated basis for the half year ended 30th September, 2022 in the required format. This disclosure has also been filed in XBRL mode.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter And Half Year Ended 30Th September, 2022
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 33(3) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we enclose herewith the statement containing the unaudited financial results for the quarter and half year ended 30th September, 2022 together with the statements of assets & liabilities and the cash flow which was considered and approved by the Board of Directors at their Meeting held today. Also enclosed is the Limited Review Report of the Statutory Auditors.

data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 33(3) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we enclose herewith the statement containing the unaudited financial results for the quarter and half year ended 30th September, 2022 together with the statements of assets & liabilities and the cash flow which was considered and approved by the Board of Directors at their Meeting held today. Also enclosed is the Limited Review Report of the Statutory Auditors.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended 31St March, 2022
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 33(3) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 we enclose herewith the statement containing the audited financial results for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2022 which was considered and approved at the Board Meeting held today. Also, we enclose herewith the following :
1. Audit Report issued by Statutory Auditors
2. Declaration (Unmodified opinion)

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended 31St December, 2021
data.news_body: Pursuant  to  Regulation 33(3) of  the  SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we enclose herewith the statement  containing  the unaudited financial results for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December, 2021 which was considered and approved by the Board of Directors at their Meeting held today. Also enclosed is the Limited Review Report of the Statutory Auditors.

data.caption: Half Year Disclosure On Related Party Transactions
data.news_body: In compliance with Regulation 23(9) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2018, we hereby submit the attached note on Related Party Transactions, on a consolidated basis for the half year ended 30th September, 2021 in the required format.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter And Half Year Ended 30Th September, 2021
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 33(3) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we enclose herewith the statement containing the unaudited financial results for the quarter and half year ended 30th September, 2021 which was considered and approved by the Board of Directors at their Meeting held today. Also enclosed is the Limited Review Report of the Statutory Auditors.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter Ended 30Th June, 2021
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 33(3) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we enclose herewith the statement containing the unaudited financial results for the quarter ended June 30, 2021 which was considered and approved by the Board of Directors at their Meeting held today. Also enclosed is the Limited Review Report of the Statutory Auditors.

data.caption: Half Yearly Disclosure On Related Party Transactions
data.news_body: In compliance with Regulation 23(9) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2018, we hereby submit the attached note on Related Party Transactions, on a consolidated basis, drawn in accordance with applicable accounting standards for the half year ended 31st March, 2021.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended 31St March, 2021
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 33(3) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 we enclose herewith the statement containing the audited financial results for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2021 which was considered and approved at the Board Meeting held today. Also, we enclose herewith the following:
1. Audit Report issued by Statutory Auditors
2. Declaration (Unmodified opinion)
